about_the_game:
The Bread Kingdom is crumbling! A sinister Mold is spreading, threatening to consume every loaf and crumb. Step into the crust of Bradley, a brave breadapus, as he rises to save his world. Explore vibrant breadscapes and venture deep into the luscious bread forests, the rumored source of the moldy infestation.

Join Bradley, a brave bread hero with a waffle tail, as he embarks on a daring quest to save the Bread Kingdom! Traverse three, short but loafy, platforming levels, battling creeping mold and cleansing the kingdom’s infected inhabitants before they’re lost forever. Can you stop the rise of the Mold Kingdom and restore the realm of doughy delights? The fate of the Bread Kingdom lies in your flour-covered paws!

Battle enemies, upgrade your kit, and uncover secrets in your quest to knead the kingdom back together. Upgrade Bradley with Yeasts of Power to gain that extra edge against the mold. These powers might help you find various collectables in this unique bready world.

  • Get Yeasts of Power to upgrade your breadapus. 

  • Collect various collectables hidden in the levels. 

Can you help Bradley rise to the occasion, or will the Mold reign supreme?

This game was made by a team of 19 passionate students in the span of 12 weeks. As part of our Bachelor program at the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences in The Netherlands. We are a collection of students from different majors, making our very first game together under the studio name "Silly Business"!

  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5

short_description: Embark on a moldy adventure in a land of bread. Play as Bradley the Breadapus, a waffle-tailed bread platypus, in this quirky action platformer and battle to cleanse a world infected by mold. Break the mold, save the world!
